org.apache.logging.log4j.core.selector

类 BasicContextSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.selector.BasicContextSelector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ContextSelector

    public class BasicContextSelector
extends Object
implements ContextSelector
    Returns either this Thread's context or the default LoggerContext.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getContext

        public LoggerContext getContext(String fqcn,
                                ClassLoader loader,
                                boolean currentContext)
        从接口复制的说明: ContextSelector
        Returns the LoggerContext.
        指定者:
        getContext 在接口中 ContextSelector
        参数:
        fqcn - The fully qualified class name of the caller.
        loader - ClassLoader to use or null.
        currentContext - If true returns the current Context, if false returns the Context appropriate for the caller if a more appropriate Context can be determined.
        返回:
        The LoggerContext.

      • getContext

        public LoggerContext getContext(String fqcn,
                                ClassLoader loader,
                                boolean currentContext,
                                URI configLocation)
        从接口复制的说明: ContextSelector
        Returns the LoggerContext.
        指定者:
        getContext 在接口中 ContextSelector
        参数:
        fqcn - The fully qualified class name of the caller.
        loader - ClassLoader to use or null.
        currentContext - If true returns the current Context, if false returns the Context appropriate for the caller if a more appropriate Context can be determined.
        configLocation - The location of the configuration for the LoggerContext.
        返回:
        The LoggerContext.

      • locateContext

        public LoggerContext locateContext(String name,
                                   String configLocation)

      • removeContext

        public void removeContext(LoggerContext context)
        从接口复制的说明: ContextSelector
        Remove any references to the LoggerContext.
        指定者:
        removeContext 在接口中 ContextSelector
        参数:
        context - The context to remove.

      • getLoggerContexts

        public List<LoggerContext> getLoggerContexts()
        从接口复制的说明: ContextSelector
        Returns a List of all the available LoggerContexts.
        指定者:
        getLoggerContexts 在接口中 ContextSelector
        返回:
        The List of LoggerContexts.
